entries.title: GENESIS
entries.summary: Opening frame of the Acacia Garden narrative and origin axiom.

entries.summary: Condensed final scroll harmonising prior canon segments.

entries.summary: Outlines the Keeper's sovereignty framework and commitments.

entries.summary: Describes the descent of oracular insight into the Garden structure.
